data.prayer: Father, help the 82,312 believers in Kachin to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kachin, Myanmar (Burma)

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Kachin, Myanmar (Burma) that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 20 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Kachin do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Kachin, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Tai Nua, Chinese Shan people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Tai Nua, Chinese Shan people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Tai Nua, Chinese Shan people is yours.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 82,312 believers in Kachin, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Kachin, Myanmar (Burma), so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kachin, Myanmar (Burma) has a population of 1,689,700.

We estimate Kachin has 82,312 people who might know Jesus, 55,607 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,551,781 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 20 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Kachin.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.
